alfredsnippet.snippet:
"In view of this, it appears that the real 'high frontier' is still very much on earth, rather than in space. The challenge is to not only reexamine the way we think, but to review the hidden assumptions in the foundation on which today's science rests."

- R.A. Ford, Homemade Lightning
alfredsnippet.name: Phys.org Post - Hidden Assumptions in Science's Foundation
